Blog.post: Hello to all the people interested on this topic, I've created this Blog to share knowledge, experiences, snippets(source code), toughts and comments on this wonderful new aproach for web development and designing that Microsoft has brought to us. Anyone is invited here, so I hope all of us will get benefit from this sharing experience. Happy programming !!!! CaRlOs LoNe Computer Engineer/System Analyst Guatemala

Hello, a new week is begining and I hope that all the Sleepers will wake up soon !!!!, it's been a while without having a new post from Ozgur, Where are u my brother, have you became a sleeper too !!!!, I'm glad to finally got some news from our dear sister Ishtiag, but, What about JOHNY MARTINEZ, it's been a while without having news from him, hey cherry or Ma. Dolores, have you heard from him?????, tell us about it !!!!. Ok my dear family, it's so bad that no one has written a comment since the las one from ozgur, Mr. Bubhest or Shaila, anyway i hope there will be new posts from all of the members, remember if you have any further question of how to post a comment, or how to become a writer in this BLog let me know, ok. For now, that's all folks !!!! Have a nice and productive Week.

Hello my dbmsfamily, how are u doing today_? It was very funny the picture that my brother ozgur fixed for our Mom, the day it´s comming mom are u ready ???, i hope so, otherwise you know you can count on DBMS, so please give us the latest details and news about that great event. Ok my dear family, please all the sleepers WAKE UP !!!!

My dear family, I'm glad because i've read all the messages sent by some of our members, please keep the light up, today i was very busy, but now ( 7:30 pm ) i have the time to write for all of you. I'll tell you about a new project i have for you guys, you'll be hearing about soon !!!!, anyway i just want to motivate all of the members to write here, and share toughts,experiences, anything ... HAVE A NICE DAY !!!

My dear brother, my dear family When I read Carlos's message,I tried not to cry in the office. I miss u so much too. I know that I have a real friend, a brother, a family in GUATEMALA. I m sure. It is very interesting that we spend 24 hours ,10 weeks together as all DBMS family but now we don't know if we can see each other again. Please, I want something from all of you. Tell the best moment for you with DBMS family and Let us to remember that moment again. I miss you all. Firstly I want to tell. The best moment was the last night of the study tour. I think you all remember the party in the Garden in Mysore. After that party , while we were returning to the hotel in the bus I enjoyed so much. I think everybody enjoyed alot. Everybody were dancing and singing. also it was still happening when we entered the hotel. We showed that "WE ARE THE BEST" ,isn't it... Ozgur from Turkiye

Hello my dear family!!!, how are u today?, I hope that everything is fine for all of you. You know, today i was thinking that exactly 2 months ago (march 21st) I left Nisiet and i tought wow, for me it seems like it was just yesterday, I can not think about forgetting all the good memories i have from that worderful experience, How can I forget about kedar's dancing, shaila's dancing, my brother Ozgur, I miss you so much my dearest brother, the Seychelles couple (Barry and Cherry), the Nasty nun (Ma. Dolores), the Golden girls, The smiley people from Thailand, oh my god my dear Mom (Lucy A.K.A. the golden african maddame), Majeed, our friends from Cambodia, Khazastan, Dohi (Where are u my dear room mate for the Study Tour?), my Sister Peace , so many people, so many good remembrances, so many nice moments, i just thank god for having given me the great opportunity to spent experiences,life and knowledge with all of you guys. so to finish i just want to say DBMS WE ARE THE BEST !!!

Hey "I love you", please come forward !!!! Today my brother started to posting messages in this Blog, I'm so glad that he has joined this activity, so i hope he can write funny stuff for us, I mean he was so good making us laugh, anyway I want to send my best wishes to all the family members and god bless you all, Have a nice day !!!! Carlos
Hi my brother Carlos Thanks alot for this. Yesterday it was holiday in Turkiye because of this I couldn't read your mail. Now I m here , I will write a detail one later. ok... See you brother Ozgur

So i'll be publishing news from our family, and if you want to send some comments, just click on comments and then, if you don't have an account here please select to post Anonymously and at the end of the comment please add your name, and remember when you're posting you can use html tags inside your comments, for example Comments Example: Hey dbms have u check this site it's wonderful --> I hope you enjoy posting messages
Hello my dear family, how are u today, for those who hasn't checked the pics I've uploaded, you can watch them at urlLink http://photos.yahoo.com/carloslone Ok, See you guys soon.
This is the new Blog for the DBMS family, i hope you enjoy this ....

Hello my dear family, a new week has come, and for me it begins so nice as i got informed that i've been hired by the national beer company (Cerveceria Centroamericana), so it's a nice opportunity and a very strong company here in Guatemala, so wish me luck in my new job, Hey were are you guys !!!!, are u still sleeping ??, WAKE UP PLEASE, hey i want to share some pics from my birthday party and my appointment at the National Institute of Engineers in Guatemala. Check them out !!! urlLink http://photos.yahoo.com/carloslone

Hello my dear family !!!, How was your weekend, i hope it was wonderful for all of you, I want to tell you that I'll start teaching again at the university, of course, a DBMS course, so please wish me good luck !!!!. Please WAKE UP, where are you guys????, i hope some of the sleepers will start posting comments here. Regards Carlos Lone

Hello my dear Family, First of all, I want to thank all of you for the nice and lovely greetings, postcards and emails for my birthday. Yesterday i celebrate my birthday and it was so nice, i'll show you some pics that i took. I wish you a safe and joyful weekend and please let's keep in touch, my best regards to all of you !!! Carlos Guatemala

Hello my Dear Family, Another Beautiful week has started, so for all of you I wish you very good luck in all the task that you'll perform !!!!, First of all I want to Congratulate my dear brother BARRY from Seychelles for his BirthDay , god bless you my brother, I hope that you'll enjoy it so much. Another announcement is that on June 18th I'll be celebrating My BIRTHDAY, so All of the members of such a special family are invited to celebrate this wonderful day with me. I miss you SO MUCH, please keep praying for all of us !!!. Regards.

Hello my dear family !!! How are u guys doing today?, i hope that all the activities are going well for all of you, I'm just fine, right now i'm finding a better job and probably within a few weeks i'll start to teach at the university, What about all of you?, I also want to thank the people that have started to post comments here. So this week it's almost over, so I wish you a very relaxing and enjoyable Weekend, and please keep in touch. This time on behalf of my sweet and lovely girlfriend and myself i want to send lots of blesses for all you. Take care Ing. Carlos Lone & María Josée

Hi brother Shaquille O'Lone These are wonderful pictures. U are like Shaq. Are watching the NBA finals??? Do u like the Turkish Player playing at Detroit Pistons (Mehmet Okur). When I see the pictures I remember the voleyball matches in NISIET. Those matches were wonderful. I enjoyed alot. Out,out ,out, No,No,No that was in,line line,net etc...big argues. Expecially Majeed was getting angry so much. did u remember??? Carlos where are u really where are u??? why did u go to Guetamala. We have alot of memories. When I receive a mail from one of us I begin to remember all those memories. wonderful memories. See u brother,Take care Ozgur

Hello my dear Family !!!! How are u guys doing today, i hope that you had a very enjoyable weekend as I had, it seems like some of our brothers are still sleeping, PLEASE "ALL OF YOU" WAKE UP !!!!!, we want to know about you guys, how are you doing?, what've you been up to lately?, so it's time, we are waiting . My dear family i want to share with you this pic, this is the Basketball team wich I play for, we won our last game last saturday. I hope you enjoy watching this !!!!

Hello my dear family, how are u doing today, i hope that everything is fine for all of you, i'm doing fine, Today i was thinking alot about all the moments that we spent together at India, wow, every single time i do that i always get amaze about how wonderful was. I really thank God for that great and pleasant adventure. I know that I'm still very young and that i have lot of things that life have to bring me, but i now that after all this experience, I got stronger, definetely because of all your support, so i want to send a huge HurraHHHHH !!! to DBMS FAMILY, thanks.... Have a nice day.

How are you guys doing? I'm so glad that finally we got news from our sister Shaila from Cuba, I felt very happy while reading her messages. Also Malu wrote, and we didn't have a message from her for a while. So I just miss all of you, I'm always telling my friends, family and even my dog "bobby", how great was to spent 10 weeks with all of you; as shaila said, I'm still dreaming about india and my dbms family. Have a nice and pleasant Weekend, and Enjoy. MY BROTHER OZGUR, Have a nice Vacation time !!!!, i hope that you can send us pictures from those beautiful places. Regards. Carlos Lone Guatemala

Hello my dear fellows, how are you guys doing?, I hope that everything is ok for all of you, the title of this post is "Finally the end of the Week", i said so because i believe that most of us have been very busy and with to much work load, but we deserve a Pleasant REST, so i hope all of you can enjoy this comming weekend so much, my best wishes to all of you and god bless you all. Regards Ing. Carlos A. Lone Guatemala

Hello my dear family !!! How are you guys doing?, i hope everything is fine for all of you. I want to tell you that I'm doing so fine at my new work, i've been very busy lately, but you know (duty calls ...), It seems that besides we have almost 4 months since we left Nisiet, we still have the fire burning, please keep it up !!!!, I'll be looking forward to have news from you, I miss you DBMS !!!, Regards, and have a nice week !!! Ing. Carlos A. Lone Guatemala

Hello to all of the dbms family members !!! How are you been doing lately?, i hope everything is fine for all of you, first of all i want to apologize for not having writting emails and comments during the last week, but i've moved recently to my new job, and i didn't have access to internet, i hope by next week i'll do. Anyway i want to take this chance to wish you a very nice weekend. God Bless you all. Regards, Ing. Carlos Lone Guatemala

My brother Carlos I think you are drunk after your new job. I hope you like your new job. I wish good luck to u...What are u doing. How is it going??? When are coming to Turkiye... Take care of u ,my sister María Josée and your lovely family. See my brother Ozgur
